author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Donald Trump decided enough was enough with the rampant crime in Washington DC, and announced he's doing something about it, leading to an MSNBC leftist's claim it's one big distraction from Jeffrey Epstein. The rub there is that the only people who think Trump's handling of the Epstein files is affecting his poll numbers are cable news journalismers wishcasting that it's affecting his poll numbers. Just ask...checks notes...CNN?

Trump announced he is invoking the D.C. Home Rule Act. DC police are now under direct federal control.

🚨 President Trump announces he
title: MSNBC claims Trump's federal takeover of DC is to distract from Jeffrey Epstein, gets fact check by... wait, CNN?

author: Brodigan
description:
Beto O’Rourke is back and you know what that means: he’s wrong and loud about it. Nvidia has made a deal with China that includes kickbacks to the United States. Is this a good deal or a bad one? After the Big Balls incident (the BBI, if you will) President Donald Trump has been taking a look at making the nation’s capital safer. His first target? The homelessness problem. We’re going to tell you exactly how much of a problem it is.

WATCH & REACT

  • RUDE TUBE Moment naked man is tackled to floor by furious Tube passengers
title: 🔴 Watch! BREAKING: Trump Declares Federal Control of DC to Crush Crime & Homelessness (Sources)

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

We here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website regret to inform you that the old folk are at it again. A human chain was formed to protest Donald Trump. Pick a reason you think they would be protesting, and you'd probably be right. While young folk a turning away from the left in record droves, their boomer grandparents are all in on whatever the left is attempting to sell.

Before we continue, peep this video from the CEO of Crowds on Demand about just how much the people who fund whatever Democrats believe that week are willing to pay fo
title: Come get your MeeMaw: Eldery leftists form human chain, claim it's to resist Trump deporting illegals [VIDEO]

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

President Trump's Big Beautiful Bill gave ICE the resources needed to finally enforce America's immigration laws. A UK version would give police the resources they need to... patrol social media and show up at your front door to confront you about expressing opinions on Facebook. Also, to investigate other police officers who can't believe the stupidity of having to do that.

Stop me if you've heard this one before. There is a group of adult men accused of raping and assaulting women, some of whom are underage. I'll give you a hint: the men in question aren't Methodists. The UK is less interested in the men
title: UK police laugh at absurdity of  confronting citizens over social media posts, now a probe is launched against HIM
